package.name: pupil_ros_bridge
package.description:
Transfer data from Pupil Labs processes to ROS
The Pupil Core eye tracking headset from Pupil Labs is managed by the Pupil Capture software, which allows access to real-time data over a ZeroMQ (ZMQ) Inter-Process Communication (IPC) backbone. Messages on the IPC backbone are encoded by MessagePack. In order to access this data from ROS, a 'bridging' code is needed to interact with ZMQ, extract the MessagePack-encoded messages, and forward them to nodes in the ROS network.
package.author: Shane Forbrigger
